Ingredients.2: 1 tablespoon butter, or more to taste

Directions.1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add penne and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes.

Directions.2: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).

Directions.3: Meanwhile, melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat and cook mushrooms and onion until softened, about 5 minutes. Stir in flour and cook for 1 minute. Slowly whisk in milk. Add peas and corn. Simmer, stirring occasionally, until sauce thickens, about 5 minutes. Add tuna and 1/2 of the Cheddar cheese and mix to combine.

Directions.4: Drain penne and fold into the sauce. Spread in a large baking dish.

Directions.5: Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted and the top is golden, 20 to 30 minutes.
